quote1.text: If you think nobody cares about you, try missing a couple of payments.
quote1.author: Steven Wright

quote2.text: Rice is great when you’re hungry and you want 2000 of something.
quote2.author: Mitch Hedberg

quote3.text: I remixed a remix, it was back to normal
quote3.author: Mitch Hedberg

quote4.text: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
quote4.author: Winston Churchill

quote5.text: Accept who you are. Unless you’re a serial killer.
quote5.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote6.text: Believe in yourself, even if no one else does
quote6.author: Sasquatch

quote7.text: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quote7.author: Albert Einstein

quote8.text: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
quote8.author: Will Rodgers

quote9.text: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quote9.author: Mitch Hedberg

quote10.text: The quickest way for a parent to get a child’s attention is to sit down and look comfortable.
quote10.author: Lane Olinghouse

quote12.text: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
quote12.author: James M. Barrie

quote13.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated
quote13.author: Confucius

quote14.text: Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
quote14.author: George Eliot

quote15.text: When things go wrong, don't go with them.
quote15.author: Elvis Presley

quote16.text: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn't have a job if he was any smarter.
quote16.author: John Gotti

quote17.text: Stop worrying about the world ending today. It's already tomorrow in Australia.
quote17.author: Charles M. Schultz

quote18.text: The hardest thing in the world to understand is the income tax.
quote18.author: Albert Einsteien

quote19.text: Duct tape is like the force. It has a light side, a dark side, and it holds the world together.
quote19.author: Paul Fix

quote20.text: I think it's wrong that only one company makes the game Monopoly.
quote20.author: Steven Alexander Wright
